name: Tap Off!
description:
This game is a head to head, one button local multiplayer, fun for the whole family! Suitable for two players or teams of two.

Grab some friends for five weird, fast paced minigames!

Sumo - Outtap your opponent to knock them out of the ring

Log - Tap back and forth to keep the log rollin'

Pizza - Tap to throw pizzas at a very hungry customer

UFO - Tap to move and fire at the opposing enemy

Barber - Tap to move your arms to cut, spray and shave your customer

Left Player Tap - A Key

Right Player Tap - L Key

Mouse to navigate menu and buttons

Gameplay, Art, Music created by Grey Magic.

If you enjoyed the game, consider donating so I can keep making more weird games! Thanks broskis!
